author-notes.corresp: Address correspondence to Raúl Gómez Román, raul.gomezroman@cepi.net, or Benhur Lee, benhur.lee@mssm.edu.

fn.p: For an editorial on this article, see https://doi.org/10.1128/mSphere.00633-20.

Citation Gómez Román R, Wang L-F, Lee B, Halpin K, de Wit E, Broder CC, Rahman M, Kristiansen P, Saville M. 2020. Nipah@20: lessons learned from another virus with pandemic potential. mSphere 5:e00602-20. https://doi.org/10.1128/mSphere.00602-20.
